text: Olympus Has Fallen is an American action movie from 2013. It is about commandos from North Korea holding people hostage in the White House. It stars Gerard Butler, Morgan Freeman, and Aaron Eckhart. It was released in summer of 2013. A sequel, London Has Fallen, was released in March 2016. title: Olympus Has Fallen
